label: person
description: "A term to define persons in the RO namespace"

label: friend of
description: "Property to indicate that a person is friend of another person"

label: structured data conforms to
description: "The profile this entity's structured metadata markup (e.g. the JSON-LD describing a PDF) conforms to."

label: local path
description: "A recommended URI path to download this work to. Intended to be used on web-based data entities within RO-Crates."
